## NetgrepInput type

Type representing a single search target in a batch search. The `T` generic is for the metadata that will be returned back in the result object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NetgrepInput<T extends object = object> = {
    url: string;
    metadata?: T;
};
```
